function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Financial strain on self-employed individuals due to lockdowns","Impact":"Increased financial strain, job losses, and bankruptcies","Mitigation":"Provide financial aids, tax deferrals, and food supply","Technologies":"Financial aid programs, tax deferral systems","People":"Self-employed individuals, construction workers","Owner":"Government, financial institutions"},{"Description":"Disruption of the construction industry due to COVID-19","Impact":"Job losses, economic impact, reduced GDP contribution","Mitigation":"Promote construction industry, implement measures for worker safety","Technologies":"Construction safety protocols, remote work technologies","People":"Construction workers, industry stakeholders","Owner":"Government, industry associations"},{"Description":"Decline in immigrant workers impacting construction projects","Impact":"Reduction in labor force, slowdown of construction projects","Mitigation":"Address labor shortage, promote worker immigration","Technologies":"Labor force management systems, immigration policies","People":"Construction companies, immigrant workers","Owner":"Government, construction companies"}]}
